p.codeblock: =# CREATE WRITABLE EXTERNAL TABLE unload_expenses ( LIKE expenses ) LOCATION ('gphdfs://hdfslhost-1:8081/path') FORMAT 'TEXT' (DELIMITER ',') DISTRIBUTED BY (exp_id);

body.p: You can only specify a directory for a writable external table with the gphdfs protocol. (You can only specify one file for a readable external table with the gphdfs protocol)
